%DURABILITY%.name: Durability
%DURABILITY%.description: A number dictating the amount of uses left.

%SET_CURRENT_ENERGY%.name: Set Current Energy
%SET_CURRENT_ENERGY%.description: Assigns a new value for a player's current %ENERGY%

%ADD_CARD%.name: Add Card
%ADD_CARD%.description: Adds the specified card(s) to the player's hand or deck.
%ADD_CARD%.shortDescription: Add card to player's hand or deck.

%TARGET%.name: Target
%TARGET%.description: Allows the player to choose a target for which the effect incurs upon.
%TARGET%.shortDescription: Allows player to choose a target.

%COMBO%.name: Combo
%COMBO%.description: Triggers an effect when played from the hand if you already played another card this turn.

%ARMOR%.name: Armor
%ARMOR%.description: Makes the minion's cost and power negatively unchangeable and the minion itself indestructible.

%SET_COST%.name: Set Cost
%SET_COST%.description: Changes the cost of relative card(s).

%RANDOM%.name: Random
%RANDOM%.description: Effects which include some degree of randomness or 'RNG' (random number generation).

%ON_DEATH%.name: Demise
%ON_DEATH%.description: A triggered effect which activates when the minion dies. It is identified by a skull and crossbones that appears at the bottom of the minion's portrait.

%AOE%.name: Area of Effect
%AOE%.description: Affects all characters of the stated type.

%DEBUFF%.name: Debuff
%DEBUFF%.description: Temporarily makes an element, be that minion or player, less powerful.

%TRANSFER_OWNERSHIP%.name: Steal
%TRANSFER_OWNERSHIP%.description: Transfers ownership of the targeted minion.

%DRAW_CARD%.name: Draw Card
%DRAW_CARD%.description: Causes the player to draw one or more cards from their deck.

%DISCARD_CARD%.name: Discard
%DISCARD_CARD%.description: Removes the specified card(s) from a player's hand.

%DESTROY_ON_NEXT_TURN%.name: Expiration
%DESTROY_ON_NEXT_TURN%.description: Destroys a target at the start of your next turn.
%DESTROY_ON_NEXT_TURN%.shortDescription: Remove minion on your next turn.

%SET_TOTAL_ENERGY%.name: Set Total Energy
%SET_TOTAL_ENERGY%.description: Assigns a new value for a player's total %ENERGY%

%TRANSFORM%.name: Transform
%TRANSFORM%.description: Changes a minion into something else irreversibly, entirely replacing the previous card.

%CONDITIONAL%.name: Conditional
%CONDITIONAL%.description: Designates the primary effect needs certain requirements met before activation.

%DESTROY%.name: Destroy
%DESTROY%.description: Destroys a target without dealing damage to it.

%RESTORE_HP%.name: Restore
%RESTORE_HP%.description: Sets a minion's current Health value back to its total Health value.

%CHOOSE_ONE%.name: Select One
%CHOOSE_ONE%.description: Gives the controlling player the ability to choose between two or more effects stated in the card.

%EVENT%.name: Event
%EVENT%.description: Effects that activate in response to specific events.

%ON_PLAY%.name: Warcry
%ON_PLAY%.description: A triggered effect which activates when the card is played from your hand.

%DISABLE%.name: Disable
%DISABLE%.description: Cards cannot be played at a location when it is disabled.

%BULWARK%.name: Guard
%BULWARK%.description: A minion ability which forces the opposing player to direct any spell or weapon attacks toward enemy targets with this ability.
%BULWARK%.shortDescription: Forces melee damage to this ability.

%SILENCE_MECHANICS%.name: Suppress
%SILENCE_MECHANICS%.description: Removes all card enchantments and abilities from the target minion, except for auras provided by other cards in play.
%SILENCE_MECHANICS%.shortDescription: Removes all boons, buffs, debuffs, and mechanics.

%SPELL_DAMAGE%.name: Spell Damage
%SPELL_DAMAGE%.description: Increases the output of your damaging spells.

%OVERLOAD%.name: Overcharge
%OVERLOAD%.description: You have {X} less %ENERGY%s next turn. This effect is activated when the card is played from the hand, and typically allows a powerful card to be played for a low mana cost this round, at the price of reduced %ENERGY%s next turn.

%RESET_VALUE%.name: Cleanse
%RESET_VALUE%.description: Resets a value back to their base values.

%IMMUNE%.name: Immune
%IMMUNE%.description: Prevents damage dealt from any source to the target, and prevents all enemy interaction with the target.

%BUFF%.name: Buff
%BUFF%.description: Permanently makes an element, be that minion or player, more powerful.

%ON_TURN_START%.name: On Turn Sart
%ON_TURN_START%.description: Actives at the start of a turn.

%SET_VALUE%.name: Set Value
%SET_VALUE%.description: Assigns a new value for something's %ENERGY% or %POWER%

%CURSE%.name: Curse
%CURSE%.description: Permanently makes an element, be that minion or player, less powerful.

%DISCOVER%.name: Acquire
%DISCOVER%.description: Choose one card from three random class-appropriate cards.

%POWER%.name: Power
%POWER%.description: The strength designation of an item.

%BOON%.name: Boon
%BOON%.description: Temporarily makes an element, be that minion or player, more powerful.

%ENERGY_SLOT%.name: Action Point Slot
%ENERGY_SLOT%.description: The resource container used to hold the primary game resource.

%ON_TURN_END%.name: On Turn End
%ON_TURN_END%.description: Actives at the end of the turn.

%RETURN%.name: Return
%RETURN%.description: Take a minion off the battlefield and return it to the owning player's hand.
%RETURN%.shortDescription: Move minion from board to hand.

%HIDDEN%.name: Concealed
%HIDDEN%.description: The card played is unrevealed until a certain condition is met.

%BOOLEAN%.name: Boolean
%BOOLEAN%.description: An effect that's only triggered if the stated conditions are met.

%MYSTERY%.name: Mystery
%MYSTERY%.description: A type of spell card that remains hidden until its trigger condition occurs, revealing it, and triggering its effect. Can only be activated during the opponent's turn, but some exceptions activate at the start of the player's next turn. Only one can be in play for a given player at a time.

%HEALTH%.name: Health
%HEALTH%.description: The vitality designation of an item.

%ENERGY%.name: Action Point
%ENERGY%.description: The primary resource used to play cards and activate class skills.
